itemDescription: Scottish Seceder minister and church historian

wikipedia_page.main: Rev Dr Thomas M'Crie (earlier spellings include McCree and Maccrie) DD LLD (7 November 1797–9 May 1875) was a Presbyterian minister and church historian. He was a Scottish Secession minister who joined the Free Church of Scotland and served as the Moderator of the General Assembly to that church 1856/57.
